title: [Rumor Woods, Caravan Trail]
[Caravan Trail]
description: Creating a semicircular barrier, a rich mountain hemlock grove casts shadows upon the burgeoning shoots of frost-kissed lupine that rise above more delicate chocolate lilies.  Bristle-headed sedge trails across the steep slopes of Cysaelotar to the northeast, while a narrow track winds through the fragrant, ungroomed puffs of alpine grass.  Banners in crimson and ebon snap in tugging breezes, their emblazoned faces difficult to discern in the constant movement.

Creating a semicircular barrier, a rich mountain hemlock grove casts shadows upon the burgeoning shoots of frost-kissed lupine that rise above more delicate chocolate lilies.  Bristle-headed sedge trails across the steep slopes of Cysaelotar to the northeast, while a narrow track winds through the fragrant, ungroomed puffs of alpine grass.  Banners in plum and cobalt blue snap in tugging breezes, their emblazoned faces difficult to discern in the constant movement.
